titleStmt.title: Sō ̃ma thanatou, the body of death: or, a discourse concerning the saints failings & infirmities Wherein this position, viz. that absolute freedome from sinne is not attainable in this life, is both proved and improved, in three sermons preached in St Edmunds church in the city of New-Sarum; the first upon Wednesday Novemb 24. 1658. being the weekly lecture day; the two last upon August 14, 1659. being the Lords day. By Joseph Swaffeild minister of the gospel at Odstocke in the county of Wilts.
titleStmt.author: Swaffield, Joseph, ca. 1625-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A.M. for Francis Tyton at the three Daggers in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: With a table of contents, marginal notes, and a final errata leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
